pages.text: $(li)Mountains are biomes located at high altitudes and they are composed mostly of Stone, Dirt and, sometimes Snow, covering the whole area.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overwold.$(br)$(li)You can find some vegetation like Spruce and Oak trees and animals like Crows, Yaks or Bald Eagles here too.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Mountains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
